data.title: The Getting High With Show PotCast with Adam Ill ft. Frank Castillo - Getting High With Show Potcast hosted by Adam Ill
meta_keywords: The Getting High With Show PotCast with Adam Ill ft. Frank Castillo
Getting High With Show Potcast hosted by Adam Ill
data.meta_description:
It was fantastic to have comedian, content creator, roast battle winner, and judge Frank Castillo back on the Getting High With show. We delved into Frank's journey, from growing up with his cousins in San Jose to moving to Temecula, working regular jobs, and eventually becoming the funniest doorman at the Comedy Store to his comedy career. His story is truly inspiring and motivating.

So, sit back with your favorite products, listen to the ebonies and ivories getting tickled by Kentron, relax, and let's get higher.

data.text:
It was fantastic to have comedian, content creator, roast battle winner, and judge Frank Castillo back on the Getting High With show. We delved into Frank's journey, from growing up with his cousins in San Jose to moving to Temecula, working regular jobs, and eventually becoming the funniest doorman at the Comedy Store to his comedy career. His story is truly inspiring and motivating.

So, sit back with your favorite products, listen to the ebonies and ivories getting tickled by Kentron, relax, and let's get higher.
